3.2.name: wordpress/videogall
3.2.description: Display a video gallery on your site. Add videos from different sites through the admin panel and get a beautiful video gallery with FancyBox effect. Also available are options to edit or delete already added videos. Videos can be categorized and displayed according to their categories aswell. You can also add a videogall widget on sidebar. Translation ready. For more details, visit http://nischalmaniar.com/videogall/
